meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Yonick Jeff Scott Mark Weston Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1676.

td.p: Linda Yonick, a pharmacist from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Jeff Scott, a systems engineer from Lexington, Virginia
Mark Weston, a writer from Armonk, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,600)

tr.td: 18th CENTURY BRITAIN
ANATOMICAL WORDS & PHRASES
GUINNESS RECORDS
COOKING
PHYSICAL SCIENCE
GAME SHOWS

Jeff
Linda

New champion: $1,799

Jeff
Linda
